data.actual_result: the new messages red line stays untill you go to another channel and return or mark the channel as read with esc
data.expected_result: the red line marker is removed (like it does when you mark just the channel as read with esc)
data.short_description: marking server as read with hotkeys does not remove 'new messages' line
data.steps_to_repro: - go to a channel with unread messages - use shift+esc to mark the entire server as read - notice that the red line is still there (if there where a lot of messages and it scrolled you down just scroll up again to to find it)
